attributes.action: Resign and hold a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As Time passes it shows more and more that Gordon brown can't control his own party let alone the goverment.

They have received illegal donations, lost personal data (more than once)

and for this he must resign

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
